name: Fashion Denim Paranoid-Her Fancy Summer
description:
Fashion Denim Paranoid is a beauty makeup game which is full of magic.
Beautiful princess loves denim.She would really like to use a great party to wear such a denim look,and you can help her create something unique!In the new game called Fashion Denim Paranoid you can choose the makeup first and then the dress and jacket!Have fun!

Game Features:
- Beautiful princess loves denim,are you wondering how much denim clothes she has
- Help the princess to create something unique in party
- Exquisite and clearly frames,vivid scenes
- Comfortable color matching,cute and lively characters
- Simple and funny operations make you easy to play Fashion Denim Paranoid
